issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

Android 3.6.10 (51)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.cafe.naver.com, https://cafe.naver.com, https://arca.live

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard for Windows and android are all the same issues.
This problem continues with changes to mobile and PC devices.

Not all times.
Image loading failures often occur, and sometimes both PC and Android fail to load CSS, causing web pages to become unrecognizable.

At this time, everything worked fine when the Adguard filtering was turned off.

Most of them load correctly, but sometimes they don't and it doesn't seem to be a problem with the filter list.

Regarding this notice at the top, I'm not sure if it should be blocked, so please add this rule:
```adblock
ddys.tv##.hthb-pos--top
```
to user rules.

### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

Android 3.6.10 (51)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.cafe.naver.com, https://cafe.naver.com, https://arca.live

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard for Windows and android are all the same issues.
This problem continues with changes to mobile and PC devices.

Not all times.
Image loading failures often occur, and sometimes both PC and Android fail to load CSS, causing web pages to become unrecognizable.

At this time, everything worked fine when the Adguard filtering was turned off.

Most of them load correctly, but sometimes they don't and it doesn't seem to be a problem with the filter list.

comment.body:
Not an incorrect blocking. `AdGuard Widgets` (part of the `AdGuard Annoyances`) blocks third-party widgets, including feedback ones.
You can read about new filters https://adguard.com/en/blog/new-annoyance-filters.html there and swap `AdGuard Annoyances` to new ones without `AdGuard Widgets`.

issue.title: Sometimes image not loading
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contains sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android, AdGuard for Windows

### AdGuard version

Android 3.6.10 (51)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Website or app doesn't work properly

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Firefox

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://m.cafe.naver.com, https://cafe.naver.com, https://arca.live

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, List-KR

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

_No response_

### Add your comment and screenshots

Adguard for Windows and android are all the same issues.
This problem continues with changes to mobile and PC devices.

Not all times.
Image loading failures often occur, and sometimes both PC and Android fail to load CSS, causing web pages to become unrecognizable.

At this time, everything worked fine when the Adguard filtering was turned off.

Most of them load correctly, but sometimes they don't and it doesn't seem to be a problem with the filter list.

Screenshots
<details><summary>Screenshot 1:</summary>

![Screenshot_20221204-130810_Firefox_Beta](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/44261958/205473958-8d1ff39e-b203-4eef-ad1d-9362455c7eb9.png)

</details>

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition

Nie potrafię odtworzyć tego problemu jeśli włączę tylko `AdGuard Base` i `Official Polish filters for AdBlock, uBlock Origin & AdGuard`.
Problem może powodować lista `AdGuard Annoyances filter` albo jakakolwiek inna lista w której znajduje się reguła z `dobreprogramy.pl#%#//scriptlet("prevent-addEventListener"[...]`, co jest związane z tym problemem - https://github.com/AdguardTeam/Scriptlets/issues/266
